com.justinkleiber.focus2d.controllers

Class FocusCollision

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.justinkleiber.focus2d.controllers.FocusCollision
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Collision

    public class FocusCollision
extends java.lang.Object
implements Collision
    Determines if Sprites and SpriteSheets are colliding or are in a certain position
    Author:
    Justin

      • collide

        public boolean collide(double cx,
                       double cy,
                       double cw,
                       double ch,
                       double ex,
                       double ey,
                       double ew,
                       double eh)
        Detects basic Collision
        Parameters:
        cx - x coord object 1
        cy - y coord object 1
        cw - width oobject 1
        ch - height object 1
        ex - x coord object 2
        ey - y coord object 2
        ew - width object 2
        eh - height object 2
        Returns:
        true if a collision exists, otherwise false

      • isCollisionExist

        public boolean isCollisionExist(int sx,
                                int sy,
                                int sw,
                                int sh,
                                int tx,
                                int ty,
                                int tw,
                                int th,
                                boolean onCenter)
        Description copied from interface: Collision
        Detects collisions between two Static Rotation Objects
        Specified by:
        isCollisionExist in interface Collision
        Parameters:
        sx - First Object's X coordinate
        sy - First Object's Y coordinate
        sw - First Object's width
        sh - First Object's height
        tx - Second Object's X coordinate
        ty - Second Object's Y coordinate
        tw - Second Object's width
        th - Second Object's height
        onCenter - Set this to true
        Returns:
        true if there is a collision, false if not

      • isCollisionExist

        public boolean isCollisionExist(int sx,
                                int sy,
                                int sw,
                                int sh,
                                int tx,
                                int ty,
                                int tw,
                                int th,
                                float s_angle)
        Description copied from interface: Collision
        Detects collisions for Dynamic rotation objects using rotation matrices
        Specified by:
        isCollisionExist in interface Collision
        Parameters:
        sx - First Object's X coordinate
        sy - First Object's Y coordinate
        sw - First Object's width
        sh - First Object's height
        tx - Second Object's X coordinate
        ty - Second Object's Y coordinate
        tw - Second Object's width
        th - Second Object's height
        s_angle - The angle that the object is rotated
        Returns:
        true if there is a collision, false if not
